intro: Persoonia curvifolia, commonly known as the narrow-leaved geebung, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Proteaceae and is characterized by its distinctive, narrow, leathery leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish-green flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. It typically grows in heathlands and sclerophyllous vegetation, preferring well-drained soils. Persoonia curvifolia is often found in coastal and inland regions of southern Australia.
